KaznakQueen.styleBaseline: cyberpunk comic, bold ink, neon accents (purple, teal, gold), biomechanical hive geometry, heterochromia eyes (gold + teal)

variations.name: Regal Threat
variations.prompt: Kaznak Queen stands tall in regal pose, arms slightly extended, carapace wings flared, expression stern but not cruel. One eye golden, the other teal. Biomechanical rib-plates glow faintly. Neon backlight highlights her silhouette. Pose: authoritative, dominant, commanding.

variations.name: Maternal Reach
variations.prompt: Kaznak Queen crouched low, hand reaching gently toward the viewer, expression conflicted between care and hunger. Face half-shadowed, resonance lines pulsing across skin. Pose: inviting but unsettling, maternal predator.

variations.name: Hive Throne
variations.prompt: Kaznak Queen seated upon a hive-grown throne of bone and circuitry. Her hair-tendrils spill downward like cables. Eyes glow unevenly (gold brighter, teal dimmer). Expression: calculating, tragic awareness. Pose: regal, restrained menace.

variations.name: Fury Unleashed
variations.prompt: Kaznak Queen mid-attack, wings arched, jaw unhinged slightly to reveal neon-lit fangs. Carapace spines charged with teal energy. Expression: enraged, sorrow masked by fury. Pose: dynamic, forward-leaning strike.

variations.name: Whispering Hive
variations.prompt: Side profile portrait of Kaznak Queen, one eye visible (teal), lips parted as if whispering. Tendril-hair hums with faint neon resonance. Background: faint silhouettes of hive drones. Expression: distant, mournful. Pose: introspective profile.

variations.name: Corrupted Elegance
variations.prompt: Kaznak Queen standing in dignified elegance, one hand raised with long clawed fingers glowing neon. Wings folded close, body slim and graceful despite corruption. Expression: sorrowful but proud. Pose: tragic queenly poise.

Lumina.styleBaseline: translucent will-o’-wisp dragon wisp, cute plush-like silhouette, rainbow shimmer, heterochromia (amber + teal eyes), fiber-optic hair, clean outlines for stickers

variations.name: Gentle Wonder
variations.prompt: Lumina floating midair, holding a strand of rainbow light like a toy, curious wide eyes. Tail curls softly with a glow at the tip. Expression: innocent awe. Pose: playful hover.

variations.name: Cosmic Mischief
variations.prompt: Lumina grinning slyly, small sparks flicking from her hair. One hand hides behind her back holding a spark. Expression: mischievous but cute. Pose: teasing lean forward.

variations.name: Soft Rest
variations.prompt: Lumina curled like a small dragon-cat hybrid, fiber-optic hair trailing like a star field. One missing eye faintly glowing. Expression: serene. Pose: sleeping curl.

variations.name: Brave Stand
variations.prompt: Lumina standing firmly, small fists clenched, rainbow shimmer intensifying. Tail arched upward like a banner. Expression: determined. Pose: defiant stance.

variations.name: Shy Peek
variations.prompt: Lumina peeking from behind her rainbow-glowing tail, half-smile, missing eye hidden. Expression: shy, playful. Pose: crouched with tail shielding face.

variations.name: Dancing Light
variations.prompt: Lumina mid-spin, trailing arcs of rainbow sparkles. Her fiber-optic hair flares outward like starlight. Expression: joyful. Pose: playful spin.

variations.name: Sorrow Glow
variations.prompt: Lumina sitting cross-legged, one hand over her missing eye, faint rainbow tears dripping. Expression: sad but radiant. Pose: contemplative sit.

variations.name: Radiant Laugh
variations.prompt: Lumina laughing openly, both eyes shining (amber + teal), tail glowing bright rainbow. Expression: joyful freedom. Pose: arms wide, floating midair.

usageNotes.guidelines: Maintain transparent backgrounds for Lumina when used as stickers, optimize under 1MB for smaller outputs, apply subtle glow for readability, ensure consistent outlines across assets.
